requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win XP+
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10.
  • Processor: Intel core i3, AMDFX 43XX
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 610, AMD Radeon R7 240 LP
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD audio

results.name: Hokuto no Ken - Hokuto Shinken Denshosha no Michi​

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64 / macOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2XXX @ 2.0GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics driver: OpenGL 3.2 or DirectX 10.0

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 480, AMD Radeon 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
